item.title: 美国公司蜂拥进入债券市场筹资
item.description: 周一，美国公司纷纷涌入公司债券市场，因为在周五的就业数据公布后，通常在新年头几天进行的季节性筹资活动获得了额外的动力，以抢在国债收益率进一步上升（这将增加融资成本）之前。【原文：U.S. companies rushed to the corporate bond markets on Monday as what is usually a seasonal fund-raising spree over the first few days of a new year gained extra momentum to get ahead of any further rise in Treasury yields - which would increase funding costs - after jobs data on Friday.】

item.title: 迪尔利用新机器加大对自动驾驶拖拉机的投入
item.description: 迪尔公司（Deere & Co）周一在拉斯维加斯举行的 CES 展会上推出了新型拖拉机和工业设备，无需人在驾驶室内操作，从而加大了对自动机械的投入。【原文：Deere & Co strengthened its bet on autonomous machinery by unveiling new tractors and industrial equipment, capable of operating without the need for a human being in the cab, at the CES trade show in Las Vegas on Monday.】

item.title: 美国港口劳资谈判重启，自动化成为焦点
item.description: 涉及美国东海岸和墨西哥湾 45000 名码头工人的合同谈判将于周二重启，这场劳资纠纷将有助于确定从缅因州到德克萨斯州的港口自动化步伐。【原文：Contract talks covering 45,000 dockworkers on the U.S. East and Gulf Coasts are set to restart on Tuesday in a labor dispute that will help set the pace of automation at ports stretching from Maine to Texas.】

item.title: 文件显示，Gemini 同意因 CFTC 指控被处以 500 万美元罚款和禁制令
item.description: 周一的一份法庭文件显示，双子座信托公司同意支付 500 万美元的民事罚款，以了结美国商品期货交易委员会对其 2017 年比特币期货合约相关声明的指控。【原文：Gemini Trust Company agreed to pay a civil penalty of $5 million to settle U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission charges in connection with statements it made in connection with its bitcoin futures contract in 2017, a court filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 美国将腾讯、CATL列入涉嫌协助北京军方的中国公司名单
item.description: 美国国防部周一表示，它已将包括游戏和社交媒体领军企业腾讯控股和电池制造商 CATL 在内的中国科技巨头列入它所说的与中国军方合作的企业名单。【原文：The U.S. Defense Department said Monday it had added Chinese tech giants including gaming and social media leader Tencent Holdings and battery maker CATL to a list of firms it says work with China's military.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，芯片公司大涨
item.description: 由于微软计划在 2025 财年向人工智能数据中心投资 800 亿美元，刺激了对半导体需求将保持强劲的押注，芯片制造商的股票周一跳涨。【原文：Shares of chipmakers jumped on Monday as Microsoft's plan to invest $80 billion in AI-enabled data centers in fiscal 2025 spurred bets that semiconductor demand would remain strong.】

item.title: 解说：TikTok 禁令之后会发生什么？
item.description: 美国最高法院将于周五听取 TikTok 及其中国所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）的辩论，后者正寻求阻止乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统签署的一项法律，出于国家安全考虑，该法律将从 1 月 19 日起禁止短视频应用，除非该应用从字节跳动剥离。TikTok 要求在法律程序期间暂停禁令，但最高法院没有批准。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court will hear arguments on Friday from TikTok and its China-based owner ByteDance, which is seeking to block a law signed by President Joe Biden that will ban the short-form video app beginning Jan. 19 unless it is divested from ByteDance, due to national security concerns. TikTok requested an injunction to pause the ban during the legal process, but the Supreme Court did not im】

item.title: 美国 11 月工厂订单下降
item.description: 美国政府周一公布的数据显示，11月份美国制成品新订单下降，而第四季度企业设备支出似乎有所放缓。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods fell in November while business spending on equipment appeared to have slowed in the fourth quarter, government data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 猪肉生产商史密斯菲尔德食品公司公开美国首次公开募股申请
item.description: 猪肉生产商史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周一公布了其在美国首次公开募股的文件。【原文：Pork producer Smithfield Foods on Monday made public its paperwork for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 加拿大服务业采购经理人指数显示年底经济活动萎缩
item.description: S&P全球公司周一公布的加拿大服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）数据显示，由于邮政工人罢工影响了经济活动，加上未完成的工作数量下降，12月份加拿大服务业经济三个月来首次出现恶化。【原文：Canada's services economy deteriorated for the first time in three months in December as a postal workers' strike weighed on activity and work outstanding tumbled, S&P Global's Canada services PMI data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普称有关其关税政策变化的报道是错误的
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一驳斥了一份报纸的报道，该报道称他的助手们正在探讨只涵盖关键进口商品的关税计划。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Monday refuted a newspaper report that said his aides were exploring tariff plans that would only cover critical imports.】

item.title: 中国出口禁令将锑价推向新高
item.description: 随着贸易紧张局势日益加剧，中国最新的出口禁令改变了关键材料市场的态势，消费者开始寻求替代供应，锑的价格可能会创下历史新高。【原文：Antimony prices are likely to hit record levels as consumers seek alternative supplies following China's latest export ban with growing trade tensions changing the dynamics around markets for critical materials.】

item.title: 美联储库克进一步降息需谨慎
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（Fed Reserve）理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周一表示，鉴于经济稳健，且通胀比之前预期的更加坚挺，美联储在进一步降息时可以谨慎行事。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve can be cautious with any further interest rate cuts given a solid economy and inflation proving stickier than previously expected, Fed Governor Lisa Cook said on Monday.】

item.title: 降价、更便宜的融资刺激需求，Lucid 电动汽车交付量超预期
item.description: Lucid 集团周一公布了创纪录的第四季度交付量，超过了华尔街的预期，因为这家由沙特阿拉伯支持的汽车制造商受益于对其豪华电动轿车的强劲需求。【原文：Lucid Group reported record fourth-quarter deliveries on Monday, surpassing Wall Street expectations, as the Saudi Arabia-backed automaker benefited from strong demand for its luxury electric sedans.】

item.title: 美国监管机构就高风险住房贷款起诉伯克希尔旗下公司
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）周一起诉沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的一个部门，指控该部门逼迫人们向伯克希尔的人造房屋业务克莱顿房屋公司（Clayton Homes）申请高风险、负担不起的贷款以购买房屋。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau Monday sued a unit of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway on Monday for allegedly pushing people into risky, unaffordable loans to buy homes from Clayton Homes, Berkshire's manufactured housing business.】

item.title: 美国航空重返 "三大 "航空公司行列，券商预测 2025 年业绩强劲
item.description: 周一，券商 Jefferies 和 TD Cowen 将美国航空公司的股票评级上调为 "买入"，认为随着该公司走出充满挑战的一年，其股价有望在 2025 年强劲上涨。【原文：American Airlines' stock is poised for a strong 2025 as the carrier emerges from a challenging year, according to brokerages Jefferies and TD Cowen, who upgraded the stock to a "buy" rating on Monday.】

item.title: 汇丰任命 Lisa McGeough 为美国首席执行官
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）周一任命丽莎-麦基夫（Lisa McGeough）为首席执行官兼美国业务总裁，成为十多年来领导该行美国业务的首位女性首席执行官。【原文：HSBC on Monday named Lisa McGeough as chief executive officer and president of its U.S. operations, making her the first woman CEO leading the bank's operations in the region in more than a decade.】

item.title: 华盛顿邮报》报道：特朗普助手瞄准关键领域征收进口关税
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周一报道，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的助手们正在探讨适用于所有国家但只涵盖关键进口商品的关税计划。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's aides are exploring tariff plans that would be applied to every country but only cover critical imports, the Washington Post reported on Monday.】

item.title: Salesforce 数据显示，受人工智能影响的购物促进了在线假日销售
item.description: 根据Salesforce的一份报告，人工智能驱动的聊天机器人在2024年假日季帮助消费者购买和退货，使美国的在线销售额同比增长了近4%。【原文：Artificial intelligence-powered chatbots helped consumers purchase and return products during the 2024 holiday season, boosting online sales in the United States by nearly 4% year-over-year, according to a report by Salesforce.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，迪士尼接近达成将 Hulu + 直播电视业务并入 Fubo 的交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道称，华特迪士尼公司和流媒体服务提供商 FuboTV 即将达成一项交易，合并双方的在线直播电视业务。【原文：Walt Disney Co and streaming provider FuboTV are nearing a deal to combine their online live TV businesses, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国钢铁公司和日本钢铁公司向法院起诉拜登阻止 149 亿美元的交易
item.description: 在美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）阻止日本公司以 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁制造商后，美国钢铁公司和新日本制铁公司周一表示，他们已提起两起诉讼。【原文：U.S. Steel and Nippon Steel said on Monday they had filed two lawsuits after U.S. President Joe Biden blocked the $14.9 billion buyout of the American steelmaker by the Japanese company.】

item.title: 当地媒体报道，智利 Codelco 公司 2024 年铜产量 "略有 "增长
item.description: 全球最大的铜金属生产商智利科德尔科公司（Codelco）董事长马克西莫-帕切科（Maximo Pacheco）周一在接受当地一家报纸采访时说，2024 年该公司的铜产量与前一年相比 "略有增加"。【原文：Copper production at Chile's Codelco, the world's largest producer of the metal, was "slightly higher" in 2024 when compared to the previous year, Chairman Maximo Pacheco said in an interview with a local newspaper on Monday.】

item.title: 芯片股上涨，期货走高
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货在上周尾盘反弹的基础上继续走高，投资者因对人工智能的持续乐观而买入科技股，并等待可能为美国货币政策路径定调的关键经济数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Monday, building on a late rally last week, as investors bought into technology stocks on continued optimism around AI and awaited crucial economic data that could set the tone for the U.S. monetary policy path.】

item.title: 早间竞价：特朗普上台前交易提振美国收益率，人民币走势震荡
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 迪斯尼、福克斯和华纳兄弟将请求法院解除对推出 Venu 体育服务的禁令
item.description: 三家大型媒体公司将于周一请求美国上诉法院推翻阻止其 Venu 体育流媒体服务推出的裁决，并辩称地区法院法官以反垄断为由阻止其计划的首次亮相是错误的。【原文：Three major media companies will ask the U.S. Court of Appeals on Monday to reverse a ruling that blocked the launch of their Venu Sports streaming service, arguing that a district court judge was wrong to halt its planned debut on antitrust grounds.】

item.title: Netflix 和 WWE 旨在推动全球摔跤热潮
item.description: Netflix 下一次涉足现场直播节目是从周一开始的，届时该公司将播出第一集《Raw》，这是世界摔跤娱乐公司每周的精彩节目，三十年来一直是美国电视的主打节目。【原文：Netflix's next venture into live programming starts Monday when the company streams its first episode of "Raw," the weekly World Wrestling Entertainment spectacle that has been a staple of U.S. television for three decades.】

item.title: 伯南克等人表示，特朗普的政策可能不会导致通货膨胀
item.description: 包括历任美国总统顾问在内的一些知名经济学家一致认为，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普扩大关税、减税和遏制移民的计划可能不会像早期分析所认为的那样引发通货膨胀。【原文：A number of leading economists, including advisers to past U.S. presidents, have coalesced around the view that President-elect Donald Trump's plans to broaden tariffs, cut taxes and curb immigration may not prove as inflationary as early analysis had suggested.】

item.title: 受高价刺激，阿根廷人到国外寻找更便宜的耐克和巨无霸食品
item.description: 在智利圣地亚哥的购物中心和巴西的海滩上，阿根廷人正在抢购服装、电子产品和 caipirinhas，因为以美元计算的国内成本因当地比索走强而飙升，阿根廷人正在利用海外价格便宜的优势。【原文：In the shopping malls of Santiago de Chile and the beaches of Brazil, Argentines are snapping up clothes, electronics and caipirinhas, taking advantage of cheaper prices overseas as domestic costs in dollar terms spike on a stronger local peso.】

item.title: 面对保守派的反弹，董事会多元化停滞不前
item.description: 2020 年乔治-弗洛伊德遇害后，投资者梅洛迪-霍布森（Mellody Hobson）回忆起《财富》500 强公司的董事们经常打电话来，要求推荐董事会中的多元化候选人。她说，现在这种情况 "非常零散"。【原文：In the aftermath of George Floyd's killing in 2020, investor Mellody Hobson recalls frequent calls from directors at Fortune 500 companies for references to diverse candidates for boards. Now, she says, it's "very sporadic."】

item.title: 总理办公室称，意大利与 SpaceX 的会谈不是梅洛尼-特朗普会晤的主题
item.description: 意大利总理办公室表示，意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼周末访问美国期间，没有讨论罗马与埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司就可能提供 Starlink 服务一事进行的会谈。【原文：Italian Prime Minister Georgia Meloni did not discuss Rome's talks with Elon Musk's SpaceX over the possible supply of its Starlink services during her weekend visit to the United States, the PM's office said.】
